meaning: sink, be submerged, subside, be depressed, aloes

onyomiExamples.meaning: settling or depositing (at the bottom of something), deposition, pigmentation, composure, calmness
floating and sinking, rise and fall, ebb and flow, ups and downs
sending a ship to the bottom, sinking (a ship), to sink a ship
agarwood, aloeswood, gharuwood, eaglewood, agalloch, agallochum, aquilaria tree, lign aloes

onyomiExamples.example: 沈香も焚かず屁も放らず
onyomiExamples.reading: ジンコウモタカズヘモヒラズ
onyomiExamples.meaning: having few faults as well as few virtues, not burning agarwood (incense); not passing wind

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to sink, to go under, to submerge, to go down (e.g. sun), to set, to descend, to feel depressed, to become subdued, to become somber

kunyomiExamples.example: 沈む瀬あれば浮かぶ瀬あり
kunyomiExamples.reading: しずむせあればうかぶせあり
kunyomiExamples.meaning: life has its ups and downs, he who falls today may rise tomorrow
to sink (e.g. a ship), to submerge, to lower (e.g. one's body into a chair), to floor (an opponent)
